description: Developed and maintained multiple company websites using Laravel, Vue, and CodeIgniter.
Build ERP fronted using React and Typescript, integrated with Frappe API.
Contributed to major websites: escolifesciences.com, esco-medical.com, escohealthcare.com.
Developed and maintained a retail inventory management system using CodeIgniter and MySQL.
Implemented modules including cashier POS, profit calculation, and petty cash tracking.
Mentored 100+ high school students in web development using Flask, Python, Jinja, Git, Web Scraping method, and Glitch.
Created and managed interactive learning materials and hand-on projects.
Analyzed business processes for GITS Project Profitability System.
Collected requirements through interviews and created Functional Specification Documents (FSD).
Built backend services using AdonisJS and PostgreSQL, combined with Postman as API testing.
